articles.title: Stock market outlook: BlackRock sees Fed rate hikes triggering recession - Markets Insider
articles.description: The one catalyst that would reverse BlackRock's view on US stocks is if the Fed makes a dovish pivot and inflation quickly cools down.
articles.content:
The 
Federal Reserve is stuck between a rock and a hard place as it attempts to balance raising interest rates with 40-year highs in inflation and the potential for an economic 
recession.

articles.title: Man who drove through DQ now in jail - West Virginia MetroNews
articles.description: SCOTT DEPOT, W.Va. — The driver who rammed his car through a Putnam County Dairy Queen Saturday night was charged and put in jail Sunday. State police charged Casey Matthew Oxley, 40, with multiple criminal counts. Troopers said Oxley has told them repeatedly…
